name: Keyword Extraction
description: Extracts the most common keywords from texts using spaCy.

input column.description: When using CSV, defines the column to use this operation on. Defaults to 'text'

output column.description: The column where extracted keywords will be stored. Defaults to 'keywords'

keyword extraction.description: Configuration for keyword extraction using spaCy.

num_keywords.description: Number of keywords to extract from each text.

language_model.description: spaCy language model to use for text processing.
